description:
**Problem**
`bd list` output is plain text. Need colorized, formatted output using Ayu theme colors for better scannability.

**Design**
Add `--pretty` flag that enables:
- Status icons with semantic colors (‚óã open, ‚óê in_progress, ‚óè blocked, ‚úì closed, ‚ùÑ deferred, üìå pinned)
- Priority colors: P0 red, P1 orange, P2 gold, P3/P4 neutral
- Type colors: bug red, epic purple, others neutral
- Closed issues: entire line dimmed
- Tree structure for parent-child relationships

Format per issue:
```
STATUS_ICON ID PRIORITY [Type] Title
```

Reference: `/Users/darin/Projects/beads-rs-macstudio/tmp/beads/cmd/bd/list.go` formatPrettyIssue()
Styles: `/Users/darin/Projects/beads-rs-macstudio/tmp/beads/internal/ui/styles.go`

Ayu colors (from styles.go):
- P0: #f07171 (red) bold
- P1: #ff8f40 (orange)
- P2: #e6b450 (gold)
- In progress: #ffb454 (yellow)
- Blocked: #f26d78 (red)
- Closed: #8090a0 (muted)
- Bug: #f26d78 (red)
- Epic: #d2a6ff (purple)

**Design Notes**
- Use `owo-colors` or `yansi` crate for ANSI coloring
- Detect NO_COLOR env var and TTY (disable colors if piped)
- Small Unicode symbols (‚óã‚óè‚óê), NOT emoji blobs
- Icons before ID for quick scanning
- Default to --pretty when stdout is TTY

**Acceptance**
- [ ] --pretty flag enables colorized output
- [ ] Status icons with semantic colors
- [ ] Priority colors (P0/P1 colored, P2-P4 neutral)
- [ ] Type colors (bug/epic colored, others neutral)
- [ ] Closed issues dimmed (entire line)
- [ ] Respects NO_COLOR and non-TTY
- [ ] Tree structure for parent-child

**Files:**
- `src/cli/list.rs`
- `src/cli/ui.rs` (color palette and rendering helpers)
- `Cargo.toml` (add color crate)
title: bd list --pretty with colorized output
